welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Monrovia, where charm meets history! Get ready to explore our vibrant city, known for its beautiful beaches, diverse cultures, and lively atmosphere. We can't wait for you to experience all that Monrovia has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"
